scripts.build: npm run css:build && npm run js:build && eleventy
scripts.build:prod: npm run css:build:prod && npm run js:build:prod && node scripts/manifest.js && eleventy
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:js" "npm run watch:css" "NODE_ENV=development eleventy --serve --incremental"
scripts.css:build:prod: sass src/assets/scss/main.scss:main.css --no-source-map && cat src/assets/css/prism-nord.css src/assets/css/prism-line-numbers.css >> main.css && esbuild main.css --minify --bundle --outdir=_site/assets/css --entry-names=main.min.[hash] && rm main.css
